html:
{% set terms_exist = doc.terms and (doc.terms|striptags).strip() or "" %} {% if letter_head and not no_letterhead -%}
{{ letter_head }}
{%- endif %}

Date: {{ doc.offer_date }}

Dear {{ doc.applicant_name }},

We are pleased to appoint you in the services of {{ doc.company }} on the terms and conditions detailed in this letter.

Your designation shall be {{ doc.designation }}.

{%- if doc.offer_terms -%} {%- for row in doc.offer_terms -%} {{ row.offer_term }}: {{ row.value }}
{%- endfor -%} {%- endif -%}
Please read the detailed terms as below. If you have any queries, feel free to get in touch with us. We look forward to your long and fruitful career association with our organisation. If you decide to join us, 'Welcome to {{ doc.company }} !'

Yours truly,



Authorized Signatory
{{ doc.company }}

{% if terms_exist %}
{{ doc.terms }}
{% endif %}
name: Job Offer

{% set date_str = doc.offer_date %} {% set formatted_date = frappe.utils.formatdate(date_str, "dd MMM yyyy") %} {% set formatted_stipend = "₹{:,.0f}".format(doc.custom_stipend_amount | float) %}

Dear {{ doc.applicant_name }},


I am pleased to officially recognize that you have successfully completed the three-month training as {{ doc.designation }} with {{ doc.company }}. Congratulations on achieving this important milestone! Your hard work, dedication, and commitment during this period have been highly appreciated by the entire team.


As per our previous discussions, we are pleased to confirm that your stipend will now start at {{ formatted_stipend }} per month, effective from {{ formatted_date }}. This adjustment reflects the progress you have made and the value you continue to bring to the organization.


Thank you for your efforts during your training, and we look forward to your continued contributions as you move forward with your role at Sarvadhi Solutions Pvt Ltd.


Please feel free to reach out if you have any questions or need further clarification regarding this update.


Once again, congratulations, and thank you for being a valued part of our team.


Sincerely,



Paras Chodavadiya
CTO,
{{ doc.company }}

html:
Dear {{ doc.applicant_name }},


Congratulations!

We are pleased to extend the following offer of employment to you on behalf of Sarvadhi Solutions Pvt. Ltd.

You have been selected as the best candidate for the post of ERP Next Developer.

As discussed, you will be joining us on or before «Offers.Expected Joining Date». This is a full-time remote job.

You are expected to sign an agreement with the organization that includes company policies.

Work Policy

1. Work Location

a. Remote job

2. Work Timing and Ordinary Days

a. The regular office hours are 09:00 a.m. to 06:00 p.m., Monday to Friday.

b. The break hours are 01:00 PM to 01:45 PM (45 minutes).

c. The daily start and finish times may change based on employer requirements.

d. Employees must notify HR or the director in advance for planned absences.

3. Agreement

a. You are expected to serve at least 12 months (excluding training & probation) to receive relevant certifications (experience letter, relieving letter, etc.).

b. An employment agreement will be signed, including all company rules and regulations.
name: RemoteJob

html:
Dear {{ doc.applicant_name }},

Congratulations!


We are pleased to extend the following offer of employment to you on behalf of {{ doc.designation }}. You have been selected as the best candidate for the post of ERP Next Developer. As discussed, you will be joining us on or before {{ doc.offer_date }}. This is a full-time position, remote job.


You are expected to sign an agreement with the organization that includes company policies.

Work Policy:

    1. Work Location:
    a. Remote job

    2. Work Timing and Ordinary Days:
    a. The Regular office hours are 09:00 a.m. to 06:00 p.m., Monday to Friday. All employees are expected to work as per the stipulated hours per day as per their discussion with the HR/TL/director of the company.

    b. The break hours are 01:00 PM to 01:45 PM (45Mins).

    c. The daily starting and finishing times may be changed from time to time by the Employer’s operational requirements.

    d. Interns must notify their head/HR or Director in advance of planned days away from the office. Unplanned absences from the office should be reported to the head/HR or Director as soon as could reasonably be expected.

    3. Agreement:
    a. The organization expects you to serve at least 12 months (excluding training & probation period) to be entitled to get relevant certification (experience letter, relieving letter, etc.)

    b. An employment agreement shall be signed by employees (Which includes all rules and regulations of the company).

    4. Probation Period:
    a. Thecandidatewillbeonprobationinthefirst3monthsofjoining.

    b. The employment of the candidate will be confirmed after their probation period is over successfully.

    c. The organization may extend an employee's probation/training period in case of a need for performance improvement.

    d. If the probation is terminated within 15 days of start, the company is not obligated to offer compensation.


    5. Leave Policy:
    a. Employees are entitled to get 15 paid leave yearly, (Leave benefit is not provided in the probation period).

    6. Resignation Policy:
    a. An employee must submit a resignation letter if the employee wants to discontinue service.

    b. An employee must serve a notice of 60 days after their resignation acceptance of any existing confidentiality agreements.

Note: Please note that your appointment is contingent upon satisfactory reference checks and clearance of any existing confidentiality agreements. Misrepresentation or omission in your application or interviews could result in termination. Disputes will be governed by Surat (Gujarat) courts.


Please sign this letter below to acknowledge your acceptance of the employment in next 2 working days or the offer will be withdrawn.


Once you accept and revert to the offer letter, kindly email a clear and visible soft copy in PDF format of the following documents to hr@sarvadhi.com:

  • Aadhar Card
  • PAN Card
  • UAN No. (if applicable)
  • Previous company experience certificate
  • Last 3 months' payslips
  • Educational qualifications (SSC onwards)
  • Bank details (passbook front page or canceled cheque)

We look forward to welcoming you to our team.

Sincerely,


Mansi Gandhi,
HR Manager,
Sarvadhi Solutions Pvt. Ltd.



ACCEPTANCE

I accept this offer of employment with Sarvadhi Solutions Pvt. Ltd. and agree to the terms and conditions outlined in this letter.
